tool_description: Calculates soil classifications using various systems (USCS, AASHTO) based on grain size distribution and Atterberg limits data.

sample_ids.description: List of sample IDs to classify

error_messages: Invalid sample IDs: One or more sample IDs do not exist or lack required data.
Unsupported classification system: Use either USCS or AASHTO.
Insufficient data for classification: Samples must have grain size distribution and plasticity data.
usage: Provide sample_ids and choose classification_system to calculate soil classifications for the specified samples.

classification_results.description: Soil classification codes for each sample

plasticity_indices.description: Plasticity index values for each sample
